message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You rejected 50/50, so I'll offer you a slightly smaller share. Take it or leave it!
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
You think I'm greedy, but I'm just trying to get a fair deal. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'm taking control now.
You think you're taking control, but I'm not going down without a fight. This is my last chance to get a decent deal.
You've had your chance, Bob. It's time to accept the inevitable.
You want me to accept the inevitable? I'll show you what inevitable looks like. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
